name: linkedin-formatter
description: Adds formatting buttons and character counter to LinkedIn post editor

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:safari
scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp -r src/* dist/chrome/ && cd dist && zip -r linkedin-formatter-chrome.zip chrome
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp -r src/* dist/firefox/ && cd dist && zip -r linkedin-formatter-firefox.zip firefox
